### Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Thermal Imaging Cameras

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: CB 755-80793440
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-242141/A
* **Publication Date**: October 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 24, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Amendment Date**: November 24, 2023

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is requesting proposals for the supply of thermal imaging cameras to support military operations. The tender includes four items:

* **Item 1**: Charging Set, Battery (GSIN: N6130, NSN: 01-7110829)
* **Item 2**: Charging Set, Battery (GSIN: N6130, NSN: 01-7110829)
* **Item 3**: Analyzer, Night Vision Viewer (GSIN: N5855, NSN: 20-A109994)
* **Item 4**: Analyzer, Night Vision Viewer (GSIN: N5855, NSN: 20-A109994)

These items are required for delivery to two locations:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Tender Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified with the brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Unspecified
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia and Nova Scotia

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Neil Trousdale
* **Contact Email**: [neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca](mailto:neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (819) 939-9208
